description:
New downloadable content (Party Spirit Pack) is coming to Party Party Time 2!
Enjoy a mix of 10 all new competitive and co-op minigames!
Get the gang together and feel your spirits climb!

The "Party Spirit Pack" includes the following content:
10 New Minigames:
6 Competitive Games
- Bungee Jump
- Digging Battle
- Big Billiards
- Shoot in the Gap!
- Run & Jump
- Lift Climber
4 Co-op Games
- Hurricane
- Go! Rocket
- Roll the Ball!
- Party Shaker
name: Party Spirit Pack
